title: Year of the Goat Icon
body: I don't know about you but I am sick to death of looking through my summoner icons and still after several weeks I still have not received the year of the goat icon. It is legitimately frustrating me, that I check day after day and still is not arrived . And yet all the posts about this god forsaken icon have since disappeared.. halp.

replies.body:
ive not recieved multiple icons i should have had since poro king.
i had to send in a support ticket for this fizz icon. the others i CBF, even though i am an avid icon collector.
Open a ticket,that's how i got mine.
